{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Ganyu
|time               = 2022-12-02
|zh                 = 
;今天是甘雨的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''我回来了!
:'''旅行者：'''嘘…派蒙，声音太大了。
:'''甘雨：'''啊…旅行者，派蒙，还有凝光…
:'''甘雨：'''抱，抱歉…我刚刚睡着了…你们有事情要谈的话，我就先…
:'''凝光：'''无需担心，这两位是专程过来找你的。
:'''甘雨：'''欸…找我?
:'''派蒙：'''好啦好啦，今天就别管工作了!快先尝尝这个素食蛋糕，香菱特制的哦~一出炉我就拿过来了！
:'''派蒙：'''还有还有&mdash;&mdash;
:'''旅行者：'''生日快乐。
|dialogue_review_zh = 「今天就别管工作了！还有还有&mdash;&mdash;生日快乐。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Ganyu]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Paimon:''' I'm back!
:'''Traveler:''' Shh... Paimon, you're being too loud.
:'''Ganyu:''' Ah... Traveler, Paimon, and Ningguang...
:'''Ganyu:''' S-Sorry... I fell asleep... If you need to discuss something, I'll just...
:'''Ningguang:''' Worry not. These two specially came over today to see you.
:'''Ganyu:''' Huh... To see me?
:'''Paimon:''' Alright alright, let's not talk about work today! Come try this vegetarian cake. It's a Xiangling specialty~ I brought it here fresh out of the oven!
:'''Paimon:''' Also also&mdash;
:'''Traveler:''' Happy birthday.
|dialogue_review_en = "Let's not talk about work today! Also also&mdash; Happy birthday."
}}
